CustomField.inlineHelpText: Active Client: Customer with at least one licence in the installed base ‘Active with Support’ where new licenses have been sold in the last 3 years. Dormant Client: Customer with at least one licence in the Installed base ‘Active with Support’ where no new licenses have been sold in the last 3 years. Inactive Client: Customer with only licenses in the Installed base ‘Active Without Support’ and where the max of the Licenses ‘Active Without Support’ end date is older than 3 months.
CustomField.label: Dassault Customer Status
